cocktails.name: 9 To 5
instructions: Stir and Strain into cocktail glass with cubed ice. Express with a lemon peel and discard. Garnish with apple slices.

cocktails.name: Dumb Blond
instructions: Shake and Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lavender sprig.

cocktails.name: Pinfire
instructions: Pre-heat a goblet, then build in glass. Top with 5oz hot water, garnish with a lemon twist and jasmine pearls.

cocktails.name: Boil Over
instructions: Pre-heat a goblet, then build in glass. Add two oz heavy cream to a shaker tin with 0.25 cinnamon syrup, shake for 10 seconds to whip, then float on top of drink. Garnish with grated nutmeg and a mint leaf.

cocktails.name: Slick Heel
instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, stir, strain into a chilled rocks glass with no ice. Garnish with an orange zest.

cocktails.name: Destroying Angel
instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, stir, strain into an old fashioned glass over large cubes. Garnish with a rosemary sprig

cocktails.name: Express Rider
instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, stir, strain into an old fashioned glass over large cubes. Garnish with a blood orange.

cocktails.name: Half-Cocked
instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, stir, strain into an old fashioned glass over large cubes. Garnish with an apricot.

cocktails.name: One-Eyed Jack
instructions: Add all ingredients but porter to a mixing glass with ice, stir, strain into a small mason jar over large ice cubes. Add porter to a cocktail shaker and shake, then top cocktail with foam. Garnish with coffee beans.

cocktails.name: Matsumoto
instructions: Add all ingredients to cocktail shaker except yuzu soda. Shake with ice double-strain into a Collins glass. Add pebble ice and top with yuzu soda. Garnish with Thai basil.

cocktails.name: Della Rose
instructions: Add all ingredients to cocktail shaker except prosecco and soda. Shake with ice double-strain into a wine glass. Add soda and prosecco and garnish with a blood orange.

cocktails.name: Hoedown
instructions: Add all ingredients to cocktail shaker with ice, shake, strain into an old fashioned glass over large ice cubes. Garnish with a piece of candied ginger.

cocktails.name: Comanche
instructions: Add all ingredients to cocktail shaker with ice, shake, double strain into a coupe. Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Lickety Split
instructions: Add all ingredients to cocktail shaker with ice, shake, strain into an old fashioned glass over large ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

cocktails.name: Gypsy Queen
instructions:
Lemon Twist Garnish
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with cube ice and stir until chilled.  Strain into chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Moscow Mule
instructions:
Lime Wedge Garnish
Fill an Old Fashioned glass with chip ice. Pour ingredients into Old fashioned glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Tommy Knocker
instructions:
Lemon and Orange Twist Garnish
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with cube ice and stir until chilled. Strain with a julep strainer into an Old Fashioned glass over cube ice. Garnish with an orange and lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Modern Old Fashioned
instructions:
Brandied Cherries Garnish
Muddle orange slice, simple syrup, and bitters in an Old Fashioned glass. Add Double Rye and High West Bourbon. Add cube ice  and stir in the glass until chilled. Garnish with brandied cherries.
Try the Old Fashioned Old Fashioned

cocktails.name: Toronto
instructions:
Orange Twist Garnish
Combine ingredients in mixing glass with cube ice and stir until diluted. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with orange twist.

cocktails.name: Old Pal
instructions:
Orange Twist Garnish
Combine ingredients in mixing glass with cube ice and stir until diluted.  Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Hot Toddy
instructions:
Cinnamon Stick Garnish
Muddle 2 lemon slices in a goblet. Add all other ingredients and stir in the glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.
Watch our US Ski and Snowboard Team Cocktail How-To Video

cocktails.name: Lion'S Tail
instructions:
Lime Wheel Garnish
Combine ingredients in shaker with cube ice and shake until chilled.  Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Brown Derby
instructions:
Orange Peel Garnish
Combine ingredients in cocktail shaker and shake with ice until chilled.  Serve up in a chilled martini glass and garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Brooklyn
instructions:
Brandied Cherries Garnish
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with cube ice and stir until chilled. Strain into chilled cocktail glass and garnish with brandied cherries.

ingredients.name: Amer Picon or -2 dashes of Angostura bitters

cocktails.name: Whiskey Collins
instructions:
Soda Water
Brandied Cherries Garnish
Combine all ingredients except soda water in a shaker with cube ice and shake until chilled.  Strain into Collins glass over cube ice.  Top with soda and garnish with brandied cherries.

cocktails.name: Mint Julep
instructions:
Mint Sprig Garnish
Muddle 4 -5 mint leaves in 0.5 oz simple syrup. Add Rendezvous Rye, fill glass with crushed (or shaved ice), and stir. Garnish with fresh mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Mountain Julep
instructions:
Mint Sprig and Lemon Wheel Garnish
In a shaker, muddle lemon wedge, mint leaves and simple syrup together. Add Rendezvous Rye and ice. Shake until chilled and strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig and lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Little Italy
instructions:
Brandied Cherries Garnish
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled.  Strain into chilled cocktail glass and garnish with brandied cherries.

cocktails.name: Penicillin
instructions:
Peated Scotch Float
Candied Ginger Garnish
Combine ingredients in a shaker with cubed ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a rocks glass over cubed ice and add peated scotch float. Garnish with candied ginger.

cocktails.name: Boulevardier
instructions:
Lemon Twist Garnish
Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass with cubed ice and stir until chilled. Serve up or over cubed ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Sazerac
instructions:
Absinthe Rinsed Rocks Glass
1.5 oz High West Double Rye
1 oz Rendezvous Rye
0.5 oz Demerara Simple Syrup
3 Dashes Peychaud Bitters
Lemon Peel Garnish
Absinthe rinse a rocks glass. Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass and stir until chilled. Strain into a rocks glass up or over ice. Garnish with a flamed lemon peel.

cocktails.name: Poncho And Lefty
instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, stir for 10 seconds. Strain into an old fashioned glass over cubed ice. Garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Devil'S Eye
instructions: Add all ingredients to shaker tin and dry shake for 10 seconds without ice. Add ice, shake vigorously until chilled, double strain into an 8oz mason jar or Nick and Nora glass. Express orange peel over the drink before serving.

cocktails.name: Chiseler
instructions: Add all ingredients to shaker tin with ice, shake well, double strain into 16oz mason jar over swizzle ice, garnish with a pineapple wedge.

cocktails.name: Highwayman'S Pardon
instructions: Add all ingredients to shaker tin with ice, shake well, double strain into an old fashioned glass over cubed ice. Garnish with blackberries.

cocktails.name: Horse'S Neck
instructions:
Lemon Twist Garnish
Fill an Old Fashioned glass with chip ice. Pour all ingredients into the glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Vieux Carre
instructions:
Brandied Cherries Garnish
Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass with cube ice and stir until diluted. Strain into an Old Fashioned glass over cube ice and garnish with brandied cherries.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
instructions:
Brandied Cherries Garnish
Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with brandied cherries.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned Old Fashioned
instructions:
Orange/Lemon Twist Garnish
Combine ingredients in a rocks glass with cubed ice and stir until chilled. Garnish with orange and lemon twist.
Try the Modern Old Fashioned

cocktails.name: Dead Man'S Boots
instructions:
Fever Tree Ginger Beer
Lime Wedge Garnish
Add all ingredients except ginger beer in a cocktail shaker. Add chip ice, shake, strain over ice, and top with ginger beer. Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Forty Drops
instructions: Add all ingredients to shaker tin with ice, shake well, double strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Heyduke
instructions: Add all ingredients but prosecco and soda to a shaker tin with ice, short shake, double strain into a wine glass. Add prosecco and soda, then ice. Garnish with a strawberry.

cocktails.name: Prospector'S Elixir
instructions: Add all ingredients but soda to shaker tin with ice, short shake, strain into a Collins glass over swizzle ice. Top with soda, garnish with a lemon wheel.

cocktails.name: Alta Ruby
instructions: Add all ingredients but prosecco and soda to a shaker tin with ice, short shake, double strain into a wine glass. Add prosecco and soda, then ice. Garnish with a strawberry.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Lemonade
instructions:
There are three steps to this cocktail. Yield: 1.5 qt (or 6 qts finished lemonade: enough for 40 cocktails!)
Step 1: The Spiced Syrup
5 Cups Sugar
4 Cups Water
2 Lemons
18-20 Whole Cloves
4 Cinnamon Sticks
1 Vanilla Bean
1 Whole Nutmeg
Cut the lemons into halves
Put all the ingredients together in a pot and make sure to mix it well, so it doesnt burn on the bottom
When the syrup starts to boil, lower the heat and simmer for 45 mins
Strain the syrup and cool in a separate container
Step 2: The Lemonade
Mix together the following:
1 cup High West Spiced Syrup
1 cup Fresh Lemon Juice (approx. 6-8 lemons)
1 1/2 cup Water
Step 3: The Cocktail
1.5 oz High West Double Rye
4 - 5 oz Lemonade
Mint Sprig Garnish
In a rocks glass add 1.5 oz of High West Double Rye then fill with High West Lemonade and add ice. Garnish with a fresh mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
instructions:
Brandied Cherries Garnish
Chill a martini glass. Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Strain back into the cocktail shaker and shake again with no ice (reverse dry shake). Double strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with Angostura bitters and brandied cherries.
